overview: Evelyn Everyone is stuck, single and lonely.  On her thirty-third birthday she makes a final bid for love, in the online world of ‘Second Life.’  But as Eve immerses herself in this unreal cyber world, she begins to realize that her fantasy lover is not who she initially imagined.  As Eve’s world is turned upside down, and inside out, she realizes that this is her opportunity to grab a second chance at not only love, but life.
title: Eveylyn Everyone
